response.overview: Craig and his cousin Day Day have finally moved out of their parents' houses and into their own crib, working nights at a local mall as security guards. When their house is robbed on Christmas Eve they set out to track down the culprit.
response.title: Friday After Next

titles.title: A Mais Louca Sexta-Feira em Apuros

crew.name: Jody Levin
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production
